name: The Polar Vet and the Non-Swimming Penguin
name_original: The Polar Vet and the Non-Swimming Penguin
description:
A cozy little puzzle game. Ludum Dare 52 entry.

During the polar expedition, you've noticed some poor penguins who can't swim. Catch them and bring them to the vet's!

HOW TO PLAY:

Drive the non-swimming penguin into the trap.

Use arrow keys to move. Press Space to restart.

The penguin and you stop only at the edges.

The penguin runs from you when you are on a next cell to it.
